snippet: The deadly bird flu virus was confirmed at a farm in Osceola County that has about 10 percent of the state’s egg-laying hens.
abstract: Agriculture Dept confirms avian flu outbreak at Iowa egg farm in Osceola County, which could affect millions of chickens.
lead_paragraph: The deadly bird flu virus was confirmed at a farm in Osceola County that has about 10 percent of the state’s egg-laying hens.

headline.main: Bird Flu Spreads to a Farm in Iowa With 5.3 Million Chickens
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Spreads to a Farm in Iowa With 5.3 Million Chickens
